```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)

options(DT.warn.size=FALSE)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r, messages=FALSE, warnings=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
dat <- read.csv(here::here("datasets.csv")) %>%
       mutate(CSV = paste0('<a href="', CSV, '">CSV</a>'),
              CSV = purrr::map(CSV, gt::html),
              Doc = paste0('<a href="', Doc, '">Doc</a>'),
              Doc = purrr::map(Doc, gt::html)) %>%
       select(Package, Item, Title, CSV, Doc, Rows, Cols, order(names(.)))

datatable(
  dat, 
  style = "bootstrap4",
  options = list(paging = FALSE), 
  filter = "top"
)
```
